notesStmt.note: "It is .. more likely that Caradog wrote his work in Latin than in Welsh" (DNB). The original is not known. This English version was in fact assembled and translated by Llwyd from various Welsh sources and expanded by Powell.
At foot of title: Cum priuilegio.
"A description of Cambria" (A1-B3) is a revision, by Humphrey Llwyd, of a work by Sir John Price.
